title: Looking for people to play with regularly in ranked duo
body:
So basically I'm a silver 5 player hoping to meet some new people to smash some games in ranked duo  and climb the ladder. Only thing I'm looking for are people who are friendly, fun to play with and not brain dead ;)

If you're keen hit me up.

replies.body: I'm your man bro , only thing i ask, is, if we do duo, i kind of like to have some sort of communication through skype preferably but teamspeak would be fine, but if your too shy or some %%%% like that, ( i know the feeling ) il be happy just to duo, please hit me back ASAP il be waiting ( im  only bronze IV but i am not braindead hahaha, far from it ) :P

I'd be willing to duo with you and climb the ladder
My ign is : Lapras2
